about_the_game:
Dive headfirst into Oubliette, a frenetic first-person action roguelike set beneath the shadowy streets of 1950s Paris. Step into the shoes of Madeleine, a private detective drawn into a living nightmare after receiving a cryptic note. What begins as a simple missing person’s case quickly spirals into a descent through chasms filled with twisted horrors that defy logic and threaten your sanity.

Perpetual Descent: The majority of your journey takes place in freefall, where you’ll dash, grapple, and slide through deadly obstacles while fending off relentless, otherworldly enemies. Precision and speed are key as you navigate this dark, ever-shifting labyrinth.

Fight or Fall: Use your handgun and bizarre artefacts that grant you new abilities—at a cost. Every blessing you uncover may tip the scales of survival, but not all boons come without strings attached. Your life itself is a form of currency, and the choices you make will determine how far you can descend.

Reality Fades Away: The deeper you go, the stranger the world becomes. Encounter grotesque creatures in an ancient, evolving system. Uncover hidden secrets, as the line between reality and madness blurs, and the history of Paris transforms into something far darker.

Features

Fast-paced Freefall Combat: Dash, grapple, and slide as you plummet deeper into the unknown, fighting to stay alive against relentless enemies.

Curse-laden Blessings: Find mysterious boons that grant new powers, but beware—every boon may come at the cost of your very life.

Surreal Exploration: Discover a surreal, nightmarish labyrinth beneath the streets of Paris, filled with secrets to uncover and dangers to avoid.

Life as Currency: Your life is a resource—spend it wisely to gain power, but risk losing everything if you go too far.

Noir meets Eldritch Horror: A unique blend of noir mystery, gothic atmosphere, and mind-bending eldritch horror. Can you survive the descent and unravel the secrets of the underground tunnels—or will you lose yourself to the madness lurking beneath the City of Light?

content_descriptors.notes: There are depictions of violence and small amounts of blood. Implied self harm.

Your life itself is a form of currency, and the choices you make will determine how far you can descend.

name: Oubliette

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3-10100F / AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For a reasonable gameplay expereince at 40-50 average FPS.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-10400F / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Super / RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Oubliette is a fast-paced, first-person action roguelike where you plummet into the depths beneath Paris. Play as Madeleine, a private detective on the hunt for a missing person, navigating a surreal underground filled with horrific, reality-bending entities. Fight to survive in unforgiving chasms.
